page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT SCENE IN PEEBLES
page.content: {Tweeddale District Council}has over 100 employees in departments like Parks,Cleansing,Rent & Burials.{Border {Regional Council}is another main employer in{Services}to Peebles such as Education,Planning,Roads & Health. {Seasonal Employment,}mainly in hotels and shops,comes from{Tourism.}Newly est.small Art & Craft shops are dotted about and a new "one-man shop" development has just opened in{Newby {Court}to cater for visitors.Many small firms in the{ Trades } are long established family concerns like Vannans (painter),Weir (blacksmiths) & Grandison (builders){Cloth weaving}has a long tradition in Peebles and this is upheld at the{March Street Mills}by Noble who export worldwide. In Peebles { Employment}a) meets demands of its inhabitants'daily needs+caters for b) healthy tourist market c)quality goods
